raw: SHANGHAI , March 31 ( Reuters ) - China began trading liquefied petroleum gas ( LPG ) options on the Dalian Commodity Exchange on Tuesday , only a day after the debut of an LPG futures contract , as the bourse experiments with simultaneous launches .

raw: Until now , China ’s commodities exchanges have listed option contracts on products months or even years after the futures contracts started trading .
